name: GUYA
description:
GUYA (translated as calf in Tagalog) is the youngling of the Kalabaw and it is the national animal of the Philippines.

GUYA symbolises prosperity and a bullish outlook ahead. It represents the young adults looking to transform into a full fledge Kalabaw as they take on this journey with us.

GUYA is a one stop app to monitor personal financial health status such as expenses, savings, budgets and investments.

GUYA hopes to enable young professionals in low income populous countries to have a head start in saving, budgeting, investing and improve financial literacy  towards financial freedom.
